GSD.description:
Revert "evm: Fix memleak in init_desc"

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.13 by commit a92d44b412e75dd66543843165e46637457f22cc. For more details please see the references link.
